thread.title: High school football games rescheduled due to heavy rain expected Friday
thread.title_full: High school football games rescheduled due to heavy rain expected Friday

title: High school football games rescheduled due to heavy rain expected Friday
text: High school football games moved up because of heavy rain expected Friday Oct 1 2015 1:16 pm The West Ashley Wildcats host unbeaten Fort Dorchester on Thursday at 7:30 p.m. The game was moved up because of heavy rain expected in the Lowcountry on Friday. Alex Holt/Special to The Post and Courier Ã— Several high school football games scheduled for Friday night will be played tonight ahead of heavy rain expected to drench the Lowcountry as Hurricane Joaquin moves up the coast. Fort Dorchester will play at West Ashley and Summerville is at Stratford tonight. Both games are scheduled for 7:30 p.m. Check back here for updates. Get more news delivered to your inbox:
